reviewText: I ordered this vhs movie use from amazon. The box was beat up but the movie worked fairly well. The movie itself was a good movie about these 2 oldish men trying to be this 10 year old bridgette's grandpa. The signs are all in french. Pretty scenery
The video was in good condition, the box was not. Which is not a problem. The movie itself was dated. I did enjoy it as I worked on the yacht that it was filmed on, in The South of France.
